properties.name: Acropolis Museum
properties.description: Ultramodern glass & steel museum housing ancient artifacts from the Acropolis archaeological site.

properties.name: Acropolis of Athens
properties.description: Ruins of iconic 5th-century B.C. temple complex on Athens' rocky hilltop undergoing restoration.

properties.name: Ancient Agora of Athens
properties.description: Famous landmark featuring the ruins of an ancient Greek gathering place & a museum with artifacts.

properties.name: National Archaeological Museum
properties.description: Neoclassical museum of Ancient Greek art & archaeology, with sculpture, metalwork, vases & jewelry.

properties.name: Temple of Poseidon
properties.description: 5th-century BCE temple ruins with Doric-style columns, offering sweeping views of the sea.

properties.name: Archaeological Museum of Sparta
properties.description: Museum displaying antiquities from Sparta's ancient acropolis & other local archaeological finds.

properties.name: The Acropolis of Sparta
properties.description: Remains of the temple of Athena Chalkioikos on the top of the Acropolis and a large Byzantine Basilica dated to the 10th century A.D. On the south side of the acropolis lies an ancient theater dated to the early imperial period. It preserves the orchestra and part of the cavea. Excavations carried out by the British Archaeological School of Athens gave evidence of decorated shops that served people attending theatrical performances.

properties.name: Sanctuary of Artemis Orthia
properties.description: Stone remains from a 9th-century BC temple, where young men were flogged for a blood sacrifice.

properties.name: Statue of Leonidas
properties.description: Close to ancient Sparta, worth stopping for quick photo with the warrior king and leader of the 300.

properties.name: Portara
properties.description: Doorlike ruins of an ancient temple standing on a scenic point looking over the city & sea.

properties.name: Archaeological Museum of Thasos
properties.description: Archaeological museum displaying ancient sculptures, pottery & artifacts related to island history.

properties.name: Archaeological Site of Delos
properties.description: Doorlike ruins of an ancient temple standing on a scenic point looking over the city & sea.

properties.name: Akrokorinthos
properties.description: Site with architectural evidence of numerous invasions plus views of the Corinthian & Saronic Gulfs.

properties.name: Archaeological Museum of Thebes
properties.description: The exhibits originate from excavations all around Boeotia and cover a long chronological period spanning from the Palaeolithic to the Post Byzantine periods.

properties.name: Archaeological Site of Olympia
properties.description: Ancient sanctuary & birthplace of the Olympic Games, with sculptures including Nike of Paionios.

properties.name: Archaeological Museum of Olympia
properties.description: Art & artifacts from the ruins of Olympia, models of the ancient city & excavation history exhibits.

properties.name: Temple of Apollo Epikourios
properties.description: Secluded archeological site known for a unique, well-preserved temple built between 450 & 400 BCE.

properties.name: Delphi
properties.description: Ancient Greek archaeological site with a stadium, votive sites & temples, including one to Apollo.

properties.name: Delphi Archaeological Museum
properties.description: Mainly architectural sculptures, statues & minor objects donated to the famous ancient Greek oracle.
